ClamAV.name: ClamAV
ClamAV.Name: ClamAV Treatment
ClamAV.Description: This treatment will operate on any file type supported by the ClamAV antivirus CoTs product. It will scan the entire payload and, if no issues are flagged, will report a success. None of the contents of the payload will be modified during this treatment

Libreoffice.name: Libreoffice
Libreoffice.Name: Libreoffice Treatment
Libreoffice.Description: This treatment converts files to PDF
